subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The acquisitions of pitchers Noah Syndergaard and Jake Arrieta, who faced each other in Game 2 of the National League Championship Series on Sunday, were critical moves for the Mets and the Cubs.
snippet: The acquisitions of pitchers Noah Syndergaard and Jake Arrieta, who faced each other in Game 2 of the National League Championship Series on Sunday, were critical moves for the Mets and the Cubs.
